Name: Bout
About the game: Arrows appear on screen and players must tap the arrows as quickly as possible. The player with the most arrows correctly pressed at the end of the round wins. Up to four players can compete to see who is the fastest. The green flashes mean a correct input was pressed and a red flash means an incorrect input was pressed. Local play is live for players to play couch co-op or use Steam remote play together. Available modes are 2 players, 3 players, and 4 players local. Keyboard and most gamepads currently work in battle.
